name: videotube
description: VideoTube: A new and improved open-source video sharing platform.
author: Jacob Sapoznikow <jacob1coder@gmail.com>

scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && yarn start" "cd server && yarn start" "cd api && yarn start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd client && yarn dev" "cd server && yarn test" "cd api && yarn test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && yarn lint" "cd server && yarn lint" "cd api && yarn lint"
scripts.build: cd client && yarn build && cd ../server && yarn build && cd ../api && yarn build
scripts.postinstall: cd api && yarn install && cd ../client && yarn install && cd ../server && yarn install
